{
"results": [
    {
        "aliases": "Red Dead Redemption 2\nRDR2",
        "api_detail_url": "https://www.giantbomb.com/api/game/3030-56725/",
        "date_added": "2016-10-18 07:29:38",
        "date_last_updated": "2021-06-02 16:33:04",
        "deck": "The third game in Rockstar's Wild West-themed series is a prequel to the events of Red Dead Redemption, returning to the open-world action of its predecessor.",
        "description": "<p>Rockstar Games announced on October 18, 2016 through their trademark teasers that Red Dead Redemption 2 was in production and originally planned to be released in 2017. The game was delayed into the next year with a final release date of October 26, 2018 on <a href=\"/xbox-one/3045-145/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-145\">Xbox One</a> and <a href=\"/playstation-4/3045-146/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-146\">PlayStation 4</a>.</p><figure data-align=\"right\" data-size=\"medium\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/3018749-7722163974-RDR2_.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-3018749\" data-ratio=\"0.625\" data-width=\"1728\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 1728px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:62.5%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/3018749-7722163974-RDR2_.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-3018749\"><img alt=\"The protagonist, Arthur Morgan\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/5/56742/3018749-7722163974-RDR2_.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/3018749-7722163974-RDR2_.jpg 1728w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/5/56742/3018749-7722163974-RDR2_.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/5/56742/3018749-7722163974-RDR2_.jpg 480w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\"></a><figcaption>The protagonist, Arthur Morgan</figcaption></figure><p>The game is a prequel set in 1899. At this time, outlaw gangs are disappearing and the <a href=\"/wild-west/3035-826/\" data-ref-id=\"3035-826\">wild west</a> era is about to end. Players take the role of Arthur Morgan, the right-hand man of the Van der Linde gang. The gang struggles to survive as the law threatens to destroy its way of life once and for all. Characters from the previous game, including <a href=\"/john-marston/3005-9449/\" data-ref-id=\"3005-9449\">John Marston</a>, <a href=\"/bill-williamson/3005-15620/\" data-ref-id=\"3005-15620\">Bill Williamson</a>, and <a href=\"/dutch-van-der-linde/3005-15727/\" data-ref-id=\"3005-15727\">Dutch Van der Linde</a>, are also present.</p><p>Gameplay will follow the traditional Rockstar open world, with some new improvements and additions. The <a href=\"/moral-decisions/3015-93/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-93\">morality </a> mechanic from the previous game is greatly expanded. The player has a vast number of options for interacting with NPCs, who will remember those actions in future encounters and act accordingly.</p><p>Rockstar has emphasized how the world will continue without the player's direct intervention. Characters have daily schedules they fulfill. They have independent conversations with each other. The player will get the sense that the world exists without them. With these advancements, Rockstar is trying to create a more believable world than ever before.</p><p>The traditional gameplay is supplemented by a new <a href=\"/base-building/3015-1307/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1307\">base building</a> system and a greater focus on multiplayer in the wake of <a href=\"/grand-theft-auto-v/3030-36765/\" data-ref-id=\"3030-36765\">GTA Online</a>. Little is known about the multiplayer aspects of Red Dead 2, but the game is rumored to follow the multiplayer setup of Free Roam akin to Red Dead Redemption.</p><h2>Story</h2><p>After a botched ferry heist in 1899, the Van der Linde gang are forced to leave their substantial money stash and flee Blackwater. Realizing civilization's progress is ending the time of outlaws, they decide to gain enough money to escape the law and retire. They rob a train owned by Cornwall, who hires Pinkertons to apprehend them. The gang performs jobs to earn money, as Dutch continually promises the next heist will be their last. Following a shootout with the Pinkertons in Valentine, the gang relocate to Lemoyne, where they work simultaneously for the Grays and Braithwaites in an attempt to turn them against each other. However, the families double-cross them: the Grays kill a gang member during an ambush, while the Braithwaites kidnap and sell Jack to Bronte. The gang retaliate and destroy both families before retrieving Jack from Bronte, who offers them leads on work but eventually double-crosses them. Dutch kidnaps and feeds him to an alligator as revenge, which disturbs Arthur.</p><p>The gang robs a bank in Saint-Denis, but the Pinkertons intervene, killing Hosea and arresting John. Dutch, Arthur, Bill, Javier, and Micah escape the city via a ship heading to Cuba. A torrential storm sinks the ship, and the men wash ashore on the island of Guarma, where they become embroiled in a war between tyrannical sugar plantation owner Fussar and the enslaved local population. After helping the revolutionaries kill Fussar, the group secured transport back to the United States and reunite with the rest of the gang.</p><p>Dutch obsesses over one last heist and doubts Arthur's loyalty after he disobeys him by liberating John earlier than planned, naming Micah, his top lieutenant, in Arthur's place. Arthur becomes concerned that Dutch is no longer the man he knew, as he is becoming insular, abandons their ideals, and murders Cornwall. He is faced with his mortality when he is diagnosed with tuberculosis. Arthur reflects on his actions and how to protect the gang following his death, telling John to run away with Abigail and Jack and openly defying Dutch by aiding the local Native American people. When the Pinkertons assault the camp, Dutch becomes paranoid that a gang member is working as an informant. Several gang members become disenchanted and leave, while Dutch and Micah arrange one final heist of an Army payroll train.</p><p>Arthur's faith in Dutch is shattered when he abandons Arthur to the Army, leaves John for dead, and refuses to rescue Abigail when she is taken. Arthur and Sadie rescue Abigail from Milton, who names Micah as the Pinkertons' informer before Abigail kills him. Arthur returns to camp and openly accuses Micah of betrayal. Dutch, Bill, Javier, and Micah turn on Arthur and a newly returned John, but the standoff is broken when Pinkertons attack. The player can choose to have Arthur aid John's escape by delaying the Pinkertons or return to the camp to recover the gang's money. Micah ambushes Arthur, and Dutch intervenes in their fight. Arthur convinces Dutch to abandon Micah and leave. If the player has high honor, Arthur succumbs to his injuries and disease and dies while watching the sunrise; if the player has low honor, Micah executes him.</p><p>Eight years later, in 1907, John and his family are trying to lead honest lives. They find work at a ranch where John fights back against outlaws threatening his employer. Believing John is unwilling to give up his old ways, Abigail leaves with Jack. John takes a loan from the bank to purchase a ranch. He works with Uncle, Sadie, and Charles to build a new home and proposes to Abigail on her return. Afterward, learning Micah is still alive and formed his own gang, John, Sadie, and Charles assault his camp and find a recently arrived Dutch, who shoots Micah after a tense standoff and leaves in silence, allowing John to kill him and claim the gang's Blackwater stash to pay his debt. John then marries Abigail, and they start a new life on their ranch alongside Jack and Uncle, as Sadie and Charles leave for other pursuits.</p><p>The final scene shows Edgar Ross observing John's ranch, foreshadowing the events of <em>Red Dead Redemption</em>.</p><h2>External Links</h2><ul><li><p><a href=\"https://www.rockstargames.com/reddeadredemption/\" data-target=\"true\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow\">Official website</a></p></li></ul>",

        "description": "<h2>Overview</h2><p><em>Days Gone</em> is open-world survival action game set two years after a worldwide epidemic. Following the story of Deacon St. John, a bounty hunter, and his fight to survive and find reasons to live. The game was developed by <a href=\"/bend-game-studio/3010-2255/\" data-ref-id=\"3010-2255\">Bend Studio</a> and published by <a href=\"/sony-interactive-entertainment/3010-995/\" data-ref-id=\"3010-995\">Sony Interactive Entertainment</a>. It was released for <a href=\"/playstation-4/3045-146/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-146\">PS4</a> on April 26, 2019. A <a href=\"/pc/3045-94/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-94\">Windows</a> version is forthcoming (expected Q2 2021).</p>",

    {
        "aliases": "Grand Theft Auto Five\r\nGTAV\r\nGTA5\r\nGTA V\r\nGTA 5\r\nGTA Online\r\nGrand Theft Auto Online",
        "api_detail_url": "https://www.giantbomb.com/api/game/3030-36765/",
        "date_added": "2011-10-25 04:11:29",
        "date_last_updated": "2023-12-29 11:33:50",
        "deck": "Rockstar returns to the fictional state of San Andreas with a crew of three criminal protagonists who work together to pull off a series of high-profile heists.",
        "description": "<h2>Overview</h2><p>Grand Theft Auto V (GTA V) takes the franchise back to the city of <a href=\"/los-santos/3035-19/\" data-ref-id=\"3035-19\">Los Santos</a> previously seen in <a href=\"/grand-theft-auto-san-andreas/3030-7120/\" data-ref-id=\"3030-7120\">Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas</a>. Unlike prior games in the series which focus on telling the story of a single player controlled character, GTA V features three central characters that the player is able to actively switch between at nearly any time during gameplay.</p><p>Rockstar Games states that this will be their largest open world game to date, boasting a total area greater than those of GTA: San Andreas, <a href=\"/grand-theft-auto-iv/3030-20457/\" data-ref-id=\"3030-20457\">GTA IV</a>, and <a href=\"/red-dead-redemption/3030-25249/\" data-ref-id=\"3030-25249\">Red Dead Redemption</a> combined. At a preview event in Spring 2013, reps said that the map in GTA V will be \"<em>five times bigger than Red Dead Redemption</em>\".</p><p>A first for the franchise, players aren't restricted from certain areas in the game and can now explore the entire environment at their leisure.</p><p>At <a href=\"/e3-2014/3015-7932/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-7932\">E3 2014</a>, it was announced that Grand Theft Auto V would be coming to the <a href=\"/playstation-4/3045-146/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-146\">PlayStation 4</a>, the <a href=\"/xbox-one/3045-145/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-145\">Xbox One</a>, and the <a href=\"/pc/3045-94/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-94\">PC</a>. The PlayStation 4 and Xbox One versions were released on November 18, 2014  with the PC version releasing on April 14 2015 after numerous delays.</p><h2>Gameplay</h2><p>The gameplay is similar to that of previous installments in the franchise. Players control one of <a href=\"/multiple-protagonists/3015-147/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-147\">three characters</a> in a free-roaming open-world environment. GTA V places a higher emphasis on heist missions, in which players can switch between the <a href=\"//www.giantbomb.com/on-the-fly-character-switching/3015-4385/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-4385\">various protagonists on the fly</a>, potentially allowing them to take control of a car or provide covering fire as they see fit. Players can also switch between the protagonists between missions at any time.</p><p>Many of the game elements found in GTA IV will return, such as: fake TV shows, minigames, clothing customization, and leisure activities, which now include tennis, yoga and base jumping. Dynamic missions have been introduced - similar to the random encounters of Red Dead Redemption, players may come across certain situations as they travel the world that they can choose whether or not to investigate.</p><p>The customary bevy of vehicles and weapons are available. A first in the series, weapons now boast the ability to be outfitted with custom parts; silencers, flashlights and more can be liberally applied to weapons of all types.</p><h2>Story</h2><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/6/60551/2365231-picture_7.png\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2365231\" data-size=\"medium\" data-ratio=\"0.51256281407035\" data-width=\"1194\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 1194px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:51.3%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/6/60551/2365231-picture_7.png\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2365231\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/6/60551/2365231-picture_7.png\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/6/60551/2365231-picture_7.png 1194w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/6/60551/2365231-picture_7.png 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/6/60551/2365231-picture_7.png 480w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\"></a></figure><p>GTA V splits its story between three playable characters, each representing a different side of Los Santos. Each character will have their own missions and side stories, as well as their own daily routines when not controlled by the player. The story progresses as the player completes missions with all three, which can allow the player to have insight into the events even when their current character does not. The player can switch between the characters at any time outside of missions and specific story moments.</p><h2>Characters</h2><p>The three playable protagonists of the game are a retired bank robber named Michael, a violent career criminal named Trevor, and a young repo man named Franklin. Each character represents a different personality and angle of the world of crime in Los Santos.</p><h3><a href=\"/michael/3005-24896/\" data-ref-id=\"3005-24896\">Michael De Santa</a></h3><figure data-ref-id=\"1300-2478162\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2478162-2409500254.jpg\" data-size=\"small\" data-align=\"right\" data-ratio=\"1.2861736334405\" data-width=\"933\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 933px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:128.6%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2478162-2409500254.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2478162\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478162-2409500254.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2478162-2409500254.jpg 933w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/5/56742/2478162-2409500254.jpg 746w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478162-2409500254.jpg 497w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 497px) 100vw, 497px\" data-width=\"497\"></a></figure><p>Michael is a successful former bank robber in his early 40s, who decided to retire by making a deal with the authorities, and settled down with his family. Now, his marriage is in ruins and he is incapable of connecting with either of his two teenage children. Michael seeks to ditch his lush life in Rockford Hills and get back in the game.</p><h3><a href=\"/trevor/3005-24898/\" data-ref-id=\"3005-24898\">Trevor Phillips</a></h3><figure data-ref-id=\"1300-2478163\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg\" data-size=\"small\" data-align=\"right\" data-ratio=\"1.28515625\" data-width=\"1280\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 1280px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:128.5%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2478163\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 497px) 100vw, 497px\" data-width=\"497\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg 1280w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg 746w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg 497w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg 1280w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg 746w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478163-2551522960.jpg 497w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 497px) 100vw, 497px\" data-width=\"497\"></noscript></a></figure><p>Trevor is a violent drug addict, in his early 40s. He has worked with Michael in the past, and is firmly entrenched in a life of crime. He has experience as a former military pilot and is currently living in Blaine County. He is the 'loose cannon' of the group.</p><h3><a href=\"/franklin/3005-24897/\" data-ref-id=\"3005-24897\">Franklin Clinton</a></h3><figure data-ref-id=\"1300-2478164\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg\" data-size=\"small\" data-align=\"right\" data-ratio=\"1.2861736334405\" data-width=\"933\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 933px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:128.6%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2478164\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 497px) 100vw, 497px\" data-width=\"497\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg 933w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg 746w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg 497w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg 933w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg 746w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/5/56742/2478164-2751857776.jpg 497w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 497px) 100vw, 497px\" data-width=\"497\"></noscript></a></figure><p>Franklin works as a repo man for a luxury car dealership in South Los Santos. He is an ambitious hustler in his mid 20s who seeks fortune and only knows how to attain it on the streets. Franklin is fit and much more capable than Michael and Trevor.</p><h2>Game Engine</h2><p>Preliminary reports describe Grand Theft Auto V's graphics engine as a modified version of the <a href=\"/rockstar-advanced-game-engine/3015-1669/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1669\">Rage engine</a> used in Grand Theft Auto IV. The engine was extensively modified for <a href=\"/red-dead-redemption/3030-25249/\" data-ref-id=\"3030-25249\">Red Dead Redemption</a> after GTA IV and further refinements were reported to be made for GTA V and <a href=\"/max-payne-3/3030-23398/\" data-ref-id=\"3030-23398\">Max Payne 3</a>.</p><h2>Multiplayer</h2><p>The online multiplayer component, referred to as GTA Online, launched as a free download two weeks after the initial release of GTA V. The service officially launched on October 1st, 2013.</p><p>In GTA Online, up to 16 players (30 players on Xbox One and Playstation 4) engage in co-op missions, competitive deathmatches, races or free roam activities. An included in-game editor also allows players to design their own missions to share with other players. Nearly all of the components from the single player game are accessible in GTA Online including side activities such as golf and tennis. Additionally, the multiplayer features player progression and persistence with each player earning reputation points and money to spend on clothing, properties, vehicles, weapons, and more. Some elements of the world are also persistent among all players in GTA Online including for example the stock prices of various companies players can invest money into.</p><p>GTA Online is set prior to the events of GTA V's single player and features interactions with some of its characters.</p><p>Rockstar has stated that GTA Online will have extended support with additional content, including the possible addition of new areas at some point in the future.</p><p>GTA Online launched on October 1st, 2013, but had some major server issues after it launched, mainly because of \"millions\" of people logging in to the service at the same time. Rockstar confirmed that they were having server issues the same day, and have been working to fix the server issues since. They have posted multiple blog posts about the progress, and almost all the server issues have been resolved.</p><p> </p><h2>Soundtrack</h2><p>GTA V features 240 licensed tracks across 15 radio stations, and is the first game in the franchise to also feature an original score. The original score is produced by three separate composers, Edgar Froese of the electronic band Tangerine Dream, Woody Jackson who previously worked on the Red Dead Redemption and LA Noire soundtracks, and the hip-hop duo Alchemist and Oh No. Each composer's distinct sound is used to define the different characters and environments of the game.</p><p>The Xbox One, PS4 and PC version receives over 150 new tracks to the soundtrack, including several exclusive original songs from the following artists: Flying Lotus, Jamie Lidell, Freddie Gibbs and more.</p><table data-max-width=\"true\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">East LOS FM</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><figure data-align=\"right\" data-size=\"medium\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/0/2840/2542597-solidsnake-2.png\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2542597\" data-ratio=\"1\" data-width=\"180\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 180px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:100.0%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/0/2840/2542597-solidsnake-2.png\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2542597\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 180px) 100vw, 180px\" data-width=\"180\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/0/2840/2542597-solidsnake-2.png\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/0/2840/2542597-solidsnake-2.png 180w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/0/2840/2542597-solidsnake-2.png\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/0/2840/2542597-solidsnake-2.png 180w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 180px) 100vw, 180px\" data-width=\"180\"></noscript></a></figure><p><strong>Genre: </strong>Various Mexican Music</p><p><strong>DJ:</strong> Camilo Lara &amp; I Got 5 on It</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table><table data-max-width=\"true\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">Radio Los Santos 106.1</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><figure data-align=\"right\" data-size=\"small\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2542584-radio-los-santos.png\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2542584\" data-ratio=\"1\" data-width=\"277\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 277px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:100.0%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2542584-radio-los-santos.png\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2542584\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 277px) 100vw, 277px\" data-width=\"277\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2542584-radio-los-santos.png\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2542584-radio-los-santos.png 277w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2542584-radio-los-santos.png\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2542584-radio-los-santos.png 277w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 277px) 100vw, 277px\" data-width=\"277\"></noscript></a></figure><p><strong>Genre: </strong>Modern Rap</p><p><strong>DJ: </strong>Big Boy</p><p><strong>Xbox 360/PS3:</strong></p><ul><li>A$AP Rocky - r-cali</li><li>Marion Band$ ft. Damian Marley - Kingston Town</li><li>Lee \"Scratch\" Perry - Money Come and Money Go</li><li>Lee \"Scratch\" Perry - Roast Fish &amp; Cornbread</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table><table data-max-width=\"true\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">Soulwax FM</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><figure data-ref-id=\"1300-2550590\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2550590-soulwax%20fm.png\" data-size=\"small\" data-align=\"right\" data-ratio=\"0.3961038961039\" data-width=\"154\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 154px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:39.6%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2550590-soulwax%20fm.png\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2550590\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 154px) 100vw, 154px\" data-width=\"154\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2550590-soulwax%20fm.png\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2550590-soulwax%20fm.png 154w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2550590-soulwax%20fm.png\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/5/56742/2550590-soulwax%20fm.png 154w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 154px) 100vw, 154px\" data-width=\"154\"></noscript></a></figure><p><strong>Genre: </strong>Techno</p><p><strong>DJ: </strong>Soulwax</p><ul><li>Mim Suleiman - \"Mingi\"</li><li>FKCLUB - The Strange Art (ID Remix)</li><li>Matias Aguayo - El Sucu Tucu</li><li>Joe Goddard ft. Ogdens' Nut Gone Flake</li><li>Queen - Radio Ga Ga</li><li>Foreigner - Dirty White Boy</li><li>The Cult - Rain</li><li>Steve Miller Band - Rock 'N Me</li><li>The Alan Parsons Project - I Wouldn't Want to Be Like You</li><li>Elton John - All the Things She Said</li></ul><p>Xbox One/PS4/PC (All of the above, plus)</p><p>Creedence Clearwater Revival - Fortunate Son<br /> Mountain - Mississippi Queen<br /> Alannah Miles - Black Velvet<br /> Kansas - Carry On, Wayward Son<br /> Survivor - Burning Heart<br /> ZZ Top - Gimme All Your Lovin'<br /> Broken English - Coming on Strong<br /> Boston - Peace of Mind<br /> Yes - Roundabout<br /> Harry Chapin - Cats in the Cradle<br /> Pat Benatar - Shadows of the Night<br /> Humble Pie - 30 Days in the Hole<br /> Starship - We Built This City<br /> Belinda Carlisle - Circle in the Sand<br /> Kenny Loggins - Danger Zone</p></td></tr></tbody></table><h2>DLC</h2><h4>The Beach Bum Pack</h4><p>The Beach Bum Pack is a free GTA Online update released on November 19, 2013. The pack is included in the 1.06 title update on the PS3. Xbox 360 users must download the 1.06 title update, (or later) then download the pack separately on the Xbox Games Store. The Beach Bum Pack includes: (Vehicles and weapons are also available in story mode)</p><ul><li>4 New vehicles: <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2630377-0_0.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"2630377-0\">BF Bifta</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2630392-canis-kalahari.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Canis Kalahari</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2630395-paradisegtavfrente.png\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Bravado Paradise</a> and <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2630391-c_speeder.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Speeder</a>.</li><li>2 New weapons: SNS (Saturday Night Special) compact pistol and a broken glass bottle.</li><li>30 New jobs, including: Races, Deathmatches, Parachutes, Last Team Standings, Gang Attacks and a new survival on Del Perro Pier.</li><li>New beach themed apparel, hairstyles and tattoos.</li></ul><h4>The Business Update</h4><p>The business update is a free GTA Online update released on March 4, 2014. The update is included in the 1.11 title update for both the PS3, and Xbox 360. The Business update includes: (Vehicles and weapons are also available in story mode)</p><ul><li>4 new vehicles: <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2630390-albany%20alpha.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Albany Alpha</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2630393-dinka%20jester.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Dinka Jester</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2630394-grotti%20turismo%20r.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Grotti Turismo R</a> and <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2630378-actual_1393892013.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Vestra</a>.</li><li>New vehicle horn, and wheel smoke options</li><li>2 new weapons: Heavy Pistol and Special Carbine</li><li>New business themed apparel</li><li>14 new missions: 4 land races, 4 air races, 1 survival, 1 capture, 1 last team standing, 1 team death match, and 2 vehicle deathmatches.</li></ul><h4>The High Life Update</h4><p>The high life update is a free GTA Online update released on May 13, 2014. The update is included in the 1.13 title update for both the PS3 and Xbox 360. The High Life Update includes: (Vehicles and weapons are also available in story mode)</p><ul><li>5 New apartments, with a new high-end apartment design</li><li>The ability to own 2 properties, instead of just one.</li><li>4 new vehicles: Enus Huntley S (SUV), Dewbauchee Massacro (Sports), Pegassi Zentorno (Super) and Dinka Thrust (Motorcycle)</li><li>A new option in race mode: Non Contact - Players can not collide with other players in a standard race.</li><li>1 New weapon: Bullpup rifle</li><li>15 new Jobs - including 5 new Contact Missions</li><li>Mental State - Players in free roam now have a mental state. Players icons on the map will start out white, but for players that enjoy killing civilians, and or other players, their icon will progressively turn a deeper shade of red. This makes it easier for other players to determine whether another player is likely to shoot them on sight.</li></ul><h4>GTA Online: \"I'm Not a Hipster\" update</h4><p>The \"I'm Not a Hipster\" update is a free GTA Online update released on June 17, 2014. The update is included in the 1.14 title update for both the PS3 and Xbox 360. The \"I'm Not a Hipster update includes: (Vehicles and weapons are also available in story mode)</p><p> </p><ul><li>7 new vehicles: <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2648308-lampadati%20pigalle.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Lampadati Pigalle</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2648309-vapid%20blade.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Vapid Blade</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2648310-vulcar%20warrener.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Vulcar Warrener</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2648305-benefactor%20glendale.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Benefactor Glendale</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2648307-declasse%20rhapsody.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Declasse Rhapsody</a>, <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2648306-benefactor%20panto.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Benefactor Panto</a> and <a href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/5/56742/2648304-benefactor%20dubsta%206x6.jpg\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">Benefactor Dubsta 6x6 </a>(Unlocked at rank 100)</li><li>New clothing, tattoos, apparel and hairstyles.</li><li>2 new weapons: Vintage Pistol, and Antique Calvary dagger.</li><li>12 new jobs</li><li>The following has been added to LS Customs: 2 new paint jobs, 4 new horns and pure black window tint.</li><li>Eight new individual player celebrations and four new paired Celebrations.</li></ul><h2>Title Update Change-log</h2><p>As of June 17, 2014, there have been 14 title updates to GTA V. You can see the full change-log for every update <a href=\"https://support.rockstargames.com/hc/en-us/sections/200102328-Grand-Theft-Auto-V-Title-Update-Information\" rel=\"nofollow \" data-ref-id=\"false\">here</a>.</p><p> </p><h2>Special and Collector's Edition</h2><p><a href=\"../../rockstar-games/65-1194/\" rel=\"nofollow \">Rockstar Games</a> released Special and Collector's edition of GTA V whicher were available for pre-order as of May 23, 2013 from participating retailers. The special edition was released at $80 and Collector's edition for $150. In addition to any variation of a GTA V pre-order, customers receiveed access to the \"Atomic Blimp\" as an in-game vehicle.</p><h3>Special Edition</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-size=\"small\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/19/193764/2487465-gta%205%20special.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-2487465\" data-ratio=\"0.6\" data-width=\"640\" data-embed-type=\"image\" artwork</li><li>Exclusive 21.5” x 26.75” blueprint map with points of interest and fast-cash opportunities cryptically marked.</li><li>25% regeneration increase to Michael, Franklin and Trevor's special abilities.</li><li>Stunt plane trials across Los Santos and Blaine County</li><li>Bonus main character outfits, tattoos and special deals with stores across Los Santos and Blaine County</li><li>Free exclusive weapons in Ammunation stores in single player: Pistol .50, Bullpop Shotgun and Melee Hammer</li></ul><h3>Collector's Edition</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-width=\"320\"></noscript></a></figure><ul><li>Everything included in the Special Edition of GTA V</li><li>Grand Theft Auto V security deposit bag and logo key</li><li>Grand Theft Auto V New Era 9FIFTY™ Snapback Cap</li><li>Classic characters from previous Grand Theft Auto games for use within the multiplayer customization system</li><li>Special vehicles and garage property including, 1930's style Hotknife and CarbonRS sports bike within single player as well as the Khamelion electric car in multiplayer</li></ul><h2>PC System Requirements</h2><p><em>Minimum specifications:</em></p><ul><li><strong>OS:</strong> Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1, Windows Vista 64 Bit Service Pack 2* (*NVIDIA video card recommended if running Vista OS)</li><li><strong>Processor:</strong> Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD Phenom 9850 Quad-Core Processor (4 CPUs) @ 2.5GHz</li><li><strong>Memory:</strong> 4GB</li><li><strong>Video Card:</strong> NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB (DX 10, 10.1, 11)</li><li><strong>Sound Card:</strong> 100% DirectX 10 compatible</li><li><strong>HDD Space:</strong> 65GB</li><li><strong>DVD Drive</strong></li></ul><p><em>Recommended specifications:</em></p><ul><li><strong>OS:</strong> Windows 8.1 64 Bit, Windows 8 64 Bit, Windows 7 64 Bit Service Pack 1</li><li><strong>Processor:</strong> Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHZ (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHZ (8 CPUs)</li><li><strong>Memory:</strong> 8GB</li><li><strong>Video Card:</strong> NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB / AMD HD7870 2GB</li><li><strong>Sound Card:</strong> 100% DirectX 10 compatible</li><li><strong>HDD Space:</strong> 65GB</li><li><strong>DVD Drive</strong></li></ul>",

        "site_detail_url": "https://www.giantbomb.com/grand-theft-auto-v/3030-36765/"

    {
        "aliases": "Red Dead Revolver 2\nRDR\nRed Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare",
        "api_detail_url": "https://www.giantbomb.com/api/game/3030-25249/",
        "date_added": "2009-02-04 07:28:56",
        "date_last_updated": "2024-10-08 10:23:08",
        "deck": "Red Dead Redemption is the spiritual successor to 2004's Red Dead Revolver, featuring a vibrant, open world set in the decline of the American Wild West. Players take on the role of former outlaw John Marston, who is forced to hunt down his former gang to regain his family.",
        "description": "<h2>Overview</h2><figure data-ref-id=\"1300-1377463\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/30036/1377463-rsg_5f00_rdr_5f00_screenshot_5f00_357.jpg\" data-size=\"small\" data-align=\"right\" data-ratio=\"0.55703125\" data-width=\"1280\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 1280px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:55.7%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/30036/1377463-rsg_5f00_rdr_5f00_screenshot_5f00_357.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1377463\"><img alt=\"It's the Wild West, so prepare for potentially deadly standoffs.\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/3/30036/1377463-rsg_5f00_rdr_5f00_screenshot_5f00_357.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/3/30036/1377463-rsg_5f00_rdr_5f00_screenshot_5f00_357.jpg 1280w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/3/30036/1377463-rsg_5f00_rdr_5f00_screenshot_5f00_357.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/30036/1377463-rsg_5f00_rdr_5f00_screenshot_5f00_357.jpg 480w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/3/30036/1377463-rsg_5f00_rdr_5f00_screenshot_5f00_357.jpg 320w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 320px) 100vw, 320px\" data-width=\"320\"></a><figcaption>It's the Wild West, so prepare for potentially deadly standoffs.</figcaption></figure><p>Red Dead Redemption is an <a href=\"/open-world/3015-207/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-207\"> open-world</a> third-person action-adventure game developed by <a href=\"/rockstar-san-diego/3010-3339/\" data-ref-id=\"3010-3339\"> Rockstar San Diego</a> and published by <a href=\"/rockstar-games/3010-1194/\" data-ref-id=\"3010-1194\"> Rockstar</a> for the <a href=\"/xbox-360/3045-20/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-20\"> Xbox 360</a> and <a href=\"/playstation-3/3045-35/\" data-ref-id=\"3045-35\"> PlayStation 3</a> on May 18, 2010.</p><p>Set in 1911 during the decline of the <a href=\"/north-america/3035-1664/\" data-ref-id=\"3035-1664\"> American</a> <a href=\"/wild-west/3035-826/\" data-ref-id=\"3035-826\"> Wild West</a>, players take on the role of former <a href=\"/cowboy/3015-1636/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1636\">outlaw</a> <a href=\"/john-marston/3005-9449/\" data-ref-id=\"3005-9449\"> John Marston</a> as he is forced by the <a href=\"/the-united-states-of-america/3035-396/\" data-ref-id=\"3035-396\"> United States</a> <a href=\"/government/3015-4262/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-4262\"> government</a> to kill or capture members of his former gang to reclaim his family.</p><p>In addition to the lengthy single-player campaign, players can participate in a variety of random encounters (including dangerous animal attacks, pleas for assistance, and deadly ambushes) and side activities (including <a href=\"/gambling/3015-1766/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1766\">gambling</a>, <a href=\"/hunting/3015-3183/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3183\">hunting</a>, and <a href=\"/bounty-hunting/3015-1143/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1143\">bounty hunting</a>). Players can also participate in online multiplayer sessions for up to 16 players (whether its an open-world \"free roam\" or conventional competitive modes) and gain <a href=\"/experience-points/3015-39/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-39\">experience</a> to unlock new weapons and characters.</p><p>The game is considered the <a href=\"/spiritual-successor/3015-425/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-425\"> spiritual successor</a> to the developers' 2004 third-person shooter, <a href=\"/red-dead-revolver/3030-8440/\" data-ref-id=\"3030-8440\"> Red Dead Revolver</a>. Despite the predecessor focusing more on arcade-style action, the two share many similarities (especially the <a href=\"/bullet-time/3015-78/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-78\">Dead-Eye targeting mode</a>). The game also includes various elements from another Rockstar open-world franchise, <a href=\"/grand-theft-auto/3025-6/\" data-ref-id=\"3025-6\">Grand Theft Auto</a>, and is powered by the same game engine as <a href=\"/grand-theft-auto-iv/3030-20457/\" data-ref-id=\"3030-20457\">Grand Theft Auto IV</a> (the <a href=\"/rockstar-advanced-game-engine/3015-1669/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1669\">Rockstar Advanced Game Engine</a>, or RAGE, developed by Rockstar San Diego).</p><p>The game received numerous updates and <a href=\"/downloadable-content/3015-329/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-329\">downloadable content</a> (paid and free). One of them, the Undead Nightmare Pack, became a special standalone release (including the original game's multiplayer, all previous paid DLC, and a special version of the original game's fold-out map poster) on October 26, 2010 as <em>Red Dead Redemption: Undead Nightmare</em>. A <a href=\"/game-of-the-year-edition/3015-3825/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3825\">Game of the Year Edition</a> of Red Dead Redemption was released on October 11, 2011, bundling all DLC while adding a new Hardcore difficulty mode (reducing the efficiency of health, Dead-Eye, and aiming capability while removing the ability to \"regenerate\" horses after their death and reducing the player's spending power).</p><h2>Gameplay</h2><p>Red Dead Redemption gives players a massive open-world to explore; players can roam on foot, ride horses, interacts with characters and the environment, and engage in shootouts. The combat in the game utilizes a cover system that allows players to blindfire, auto-target or free aim, all using period weaponry, ranging from revolvers to cannons. The combat system also allows players to target specific body parts for non-lethal take downs.</p><p>While the game plays like a typical open-world third-person shooter in a lot of ways, the western setting allows for a number of unique gameplay mechanics that differentiate it from similar titles:</p><h3>Fame and Honor</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/30036/1368976-1.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1368976\" data-size=\"small\" data-ratio=\"0.5625\" data-width=\"1280\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 1280px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:56.3%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/30036/1368976-1.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1368976\"><img alt=\"Fame and Honor affect how people react to John.\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/3/30036/1368976-1.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/3/30036/1368976-1.jpg 1280w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/3/30036/1368976-1.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/30036/1368976-1.jpg 480w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_small/3/30036/1368976-1.jpg 320w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 320px) 100vw, 320px\" data-width=\"320\"></a><figcaption>Fame and Honor affect how people react to John.</figcaption></figure><p>The game uses a fame and honor system. The fame system is an indicator of the player character's notoriety; as the player completes missions and earns themselves a name, their fame will increase. A player's fame rating affects how <a href=\"../../non-player-character/92-967/\" rel=\"nofollow \"> NPCs</a> react to them; for example, when a player with a high fame rating enters a town for the first time, they might be challenged to a shootout by someone who is trying to make a name for themselves.</p><p>Similarly, the honor system works as a sort of morality system, where the player has to choose whether he is for the law or against it. A number of factors influence John's honor; like the way he dresses and the side missions the player completes, as well as how they respond to the random events in the environment. An example of this is Marston coming across some highwaymen that are holding up a group of travelers; Marston can either take the honorable path and shoot the would-be robbers, or he can join the bandits by killing the travelers and looting their bodies with them.</p><h3>Dead-Eye Targeting</h3><p>John Marston is a very lethal shot, and the game reflects this with a kind of <a href=\"../../bullet-time/92-78/\" rel=\"nofollow \"> bullet-time</a> system known as Dead-Eye targeting. Players can activate Dead-Eye to slow down the game world, allowing them to either place precise shots on specific body parts or 'paint' multiple shots across several enemies. When the sequence ends Marston fires off all the shots in quick succession to devastating effect, usually resulting in one shot kills.</p><h3>Horses</h3><p>Horses are John Marston's main means of transportation in Red Dead Redemption. There are many different types of breeds, some faster than others. The game recommends the player sticks with the same horse as they can build a bond with said horse, increasing its stamina. If the player tries to make their horse gallop for too long, it'll throw them off it. If the horse dies, two things can happen: The player has the deed for it thus after about 30 seconds all they have to do is whistle and it'll come back, or, they don't have the deed and thus just get a random horse.</p><p>When having to follow someone who's also on horse, the player can hold down A (on Xbox 360) or X (on PlayStation 3) and their horse will automatically follow the horse in front of them with consistent speed and sticking to the main route.</p><h3>Ambient Missions</h3><p>Ambient missions are special tasks that have players interacting with the game world in different ways. There are four types of missions: Sharpshooter (usually has Marston killing things with his gun), Survivalist (has Marston collect flowers all over the game world), Treasure Hunter (John finds a map and must try to find the treasure) and Master Hunter (has John hunt and kill the local wildlife). Each mission has different levels and completing all of them unlocks certain things.</p><h3>Hunting</h3><p>Hunting different animals presents different challenges; from bears, to buffalo, to cougars, some animals require stealth and sneaking, some require extreme firepower, some rare animals need to be tracked and some require a chase. But some animals, like the obviously dangerous ones, can easily kill Marston, emphasizing the need for caution. Once an animal is killed, Marston can skin it and the meat and pelt can be sold or traded in towns.</p><p>Here's the list of all the animals that players can come across in Red Dead:</p><ul><li><a href=\"/armadillo/3015-3902/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3902\"> Armadillo</a></li><li><a href=\"/bears/3015-1848/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1848\"> Bear</a></li><li><a href=\"/beaver/3015-3619/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3619\"> Beaver</a></li><li><a href=\"/sheep/3015-3107/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3107\"> Bighorn Sheep</a></li><li><a href=\"/boar/3015-3122/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3122\"> Boar</a></li><li><a href=\"/bobcat/3015-7216/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-7216\"> Bobcat</a></li><li><a href=\"/bison/3015-5305/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-5305\"> Buffalo</a></li><li><a href=\"/chicken/3015-1867/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1867\"> Chicken</a></li><li><a href=\"/cougars/3015-2606/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-2606\"> Cougar</a></li><li><a href=\"/cow/3015-3108/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3108\"> Cow</a></li><li><a href=\"/coyote/3015-5440/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-5440\"> Coyote</a></li><li><a href=\"/crow/3015-4907/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-4907\"> Crow</a></li><li><a href=\"/deer/3015-5276/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-5276\"> Deer</a></li><li><a href=\"/dog/3015-820/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-820\"> Dog</a></li><li><a href=\"/donkey/3015-4285/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-4285\"> Donkey</a></li><li><a href=\"/ducks/3015-1891/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-1891\"> Duck</a></li><li><a href=\"/eagle/3015-3103/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3103\"> Eagle</a></li><li><a href=\"/moose/3015-2271/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-2271\"> Elk</a></li><li><a href=\"/fox/3015-2371/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-2371\"> Fox</a></li><li><a href=\"/goat/3015-3112/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3112\"> Goat</a></li><li><a href=\"/hawk/3015-6328/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-6328\"> Hawk</a></li><li><a href=\"/horse/3015-3114/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3114\"> Horse</a></li><li><a href=\"/owl/3015-3671/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3671\"> Owl</a></li><li><a href=\"/pig/3015-2281/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-2281\"> Pig</a></li><li><a href=\"/rabbit/3015-2266/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-2266\"> Rabbit</a></li><li><a href=\"/raccoon/3015-2614/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-2614\"> Raccoon</a></li><li><a href=\"/gull/3015-4405/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-4405\"> Seagull</a></li><li><a href=\"/skunks/3015-5769/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-5769\"> Skunks</a></li><li><a href=\"/snakes/3015-3548/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3548\"> Snake</a></li><li>Songbird</li><li><a href=\"/vulture/3015-3497/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-3497\"> Vulture</a></li><li><a href=\"/wolf/3015-2265/\" data-ref-id=\"3015-2265\"> Wolf</a></li></ul><h3>Sandbox Events</h3><p>While traversing the world of Red Dead Redemption players are confronted with a variety of random events which both change up the gameplay and help develop a unique sense of place in America's Old West. Over 500 unique characters and 40 unique animal species populate the world and their unique <a href=\"../../artificial-intelligence/92-218/\" rel=\"nofollow \"> AI</a> provides scores of opportunities for gameplay with traveling across the plains.</p><p>The people and animals of the Old West provide Marston with the following challenges and opportunities:</p><ul><li><b>Ambushes -</b> When traveling by road or when approaching strangers ambushes can arise, often resulting in deadly shootouts.</li><li><b>Bounty Hunting</b> - Players can take up bounties to track down criminals for the police. The player can use the lasso to take the prisoner alive for greater reward and a positive effect on Marston's honor, or they can simply kill the bandit.</li><li><b>Burglary</b> - Players can break into houses, banks, and homesteads and get away with as much loot as possible. If caught, however, Marston's honor will plummet.</li><li><b>Camping</b> - At night players can join camps in the wilderness to hear news and rumors about the events of the game.</li><li><b>Cattle Herding</b> - Players can take jobs to assist ranchers herd their cattle for rewards.</li><li><b>Dueling</b> - Players can engage in a classic duel of quick draw. If the players is first to draw, they have more time, but their accuracy takes a hit. Same goes vice-versa.</li><li><b>Escort Missions</b> - While traveling the wilderness strangers may approach Marston and ask for an escort.</li><li><b>Executions</b> - Be it roadside shootings or formal hangings, player will experience public executions and react however they feel. Intervening can affect Marston's fame and honor.</li><li><b>Hideouts</b> - In the world John may come across gang hideouts which he can clear out for XP, weapons and cash.</li><li><b>Horse Taming</b> - When players come across horses in the wild they can use the lasso to capture them and then break the horse and use it to travel. The player can also find pens and break horses to help the townsfolk.</li><li><b>Nightwatch</b> - Characters may ask Marston to help them protect their ranch or town from armed outlaws and animals over night.</li><li><b>Plant Gathering</b> - Rare species of plants in the environment can be collected and sold at towns and outposts.</li><li><b>Treasure Hunting -</b> Players can buy maps or just get lucky and find treasure throughout the world.</li><li><b>Guard Trains</b> - Sometimes when riding a train robbers may attack it. Here Marston will need to protect himself and the passengers.</li><li><b>Challenges</b> - Events such as shooting birds, gathering plants, and finding treasure maps unlock challenges that can be completed as the game goes on.</li><li><b>Attack or Defend Cart -</b> Players can either help the bandits or travelers when the cart is attacked, giving players different amounts of honor and money.</li></ul><h3>Outfits</h3><p>John Marston can wear different outfits in the game. To earn these outfits, players must complete certain tasks that the game outlines for them. Each outfit gives John a special ability from being able to cheat at poker to making him look like a gang member, thus never being attacked by that gang:</p><ul><li><strong>Cowboy Outfit</strong>: Marston's first outfit. It doesn't give John any bonuses.</li><li><strong>Gentleman's Attire</strong>: Lets John play poker at Blackwater. Players can only get it by syncing their gamertag or PSN ID with the Rockstar Social Club.</li><li><strong>Elegant Suit</strong>: Lets Marston cheat at poker.</li><li><strong>Bollard Twins Outfit</strong>: Makes the Bollard Twins gang think John is one of their own and not attack him.</li><li><strong>Treasure Hunter Outfit</strong>: Same effect as the previous outfit except only works with the Treasure Hunter gang.</li><li><strong>Bandido Outfit:</strong> Bandidos take Marston as a friend.</li><li><strong>Reyes Rebels Outfit</strong>: The law in Mexico won't pursue Marston.</li><li><strong>US Army Uniform</strong>: Does nothing other than make John look cool.</li><li><strong>US Marshal Uniform</strong>: The law in the US won't pursue John.</li><li><strong>Legend of the West</strong>: Increases the Dead Eye-meter.</li><li><strong>Bureau Uniform</strong>: Lets Marston do whatever he likes without intervention from the law.</li><li><strong>Duster Coat</strong>: Does nothing other than protect John from dust.</li><li><strong>Mexican Poncho</strong>: Makes Marston look like Clint Eastwood.</li><li><strong>Rancher Clothing</strong>: Marston's typical outfit when herding cattle.</li><li><strong>Walton's Gang</strong>: Makes members of the Walton Gang friendly towards John. The outfit was initially exclusive to the PS3 version but later also available in the Game of the Year Edition on both platforms.</li><li><strong>Deadly Assassin</strong>: Makes Dead Eye-meter regenerate faster. The outfit was initially only obtainable as a pre-order bonus but was later released as DLC and included in the Game of the Year Edition.</li><li><b>Expert Hunter</b>: Makes the player receive double the amount of materials from any skinned animal. (Available through the free Hunting and Trading Outfits DLC pack.)</li><li><b>Savvy Merchant</b>: Gives the player half-off any items purchased at any gunsmith throughout the game. (Available through the free Hunting and Trading Outfits DLC pack.)</li></ul><h3>Strangers</h3><p>The game is populated with side quests given to them by \"strangers\". They're represented on the map by a question mark and are optional. When players accept one, they can finish it whenever they like. Some require them collecting things, others just ask players to kill people. Some stranger missions are multiple parts and some are even just cut-scenes. Some let the players chose how they want to complete them. For example, early on in the game one stranger asks Marston to get a property for him. The player can choose to kill the owner of said property or nicely buy it from him.</p><h3><b>Mini-Games</b></h3><p>In true open-world fashion, the game includes a variety of <a href=\"../../minigames/92-116/\" rel=\"nofollow \"> mini-games</a> for players to engage in, including Five-Finger Fillet, Texas Hold 'Em Poker, arm wrestling, Blackjack, drinking, horseshoes and Liar's Dice. These mini-games primarily take place in saloons and each features unique control schemes to suit their style.</p><h2>The World</h2><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1284769\" data-size=\"medium\" data-ratio=\"0.5625\" data-width=\"1280\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 1280px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:56.3%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1284769\"><img alt=\"It's a big, beautiful, and bustling world.\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg 1280w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg 480w\"><noscript><img alt=\"It's a big, beautiful, and bustling world.\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg 1280w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/33529/1284769-39.jpg 480w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\"></noscript></a><figcaption>It's a big, beautiful, and bustling world.</figcaption></figure><p>The game world in Red Dead Redemption is the largest ever seen in a Rockstar game. The game takes place on the border of the United States and Mexico in the Old West during the turn of 20th Century. The region and time period were thoroughly researched to provide the most historically accurate rendition of the area as is possible.</p><p>The unique geography of the region means that the game world features deserts, forest, canyons, and snowy mountains, along with towns, people and architecture of both period accurate American and Mexican culture. The unique time period means that the world has a mix of old and new buildings, weapons and technology.</p><p>The game's map consists of 3 main regions each with their own sub-regions:</p><table><tbody><tr><td><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1372994-the_frontier.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1372994\" data-size=\"medium\" data-ratio=\"0.43899895724713\" data-width=\"959\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 959px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:43.9%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1372994-the_frontier.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1372994\"><img alt=\"New Austin\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372994-the_frontier.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1372994-the_frontier.jpg 959w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372994-the_frontier.jpg 480w\"><noscript><img alt=\"New Austin\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372994-the_frontier.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1372994-the_frontier.jpg 959w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372994-the_frontier.jpg 480w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\"></noscript></a><figcaption>New Austin</figcaption></figure><b>New Austin</b><br />This Frontier region contains four sub-regions: Gaptooth Ridge, Rio Bravo, Cholla Springs, and Hennigan's Stead. Some of the major features are Lake Don Julio, Hennigan's Stead and Thieves' Landing.</td></tr><tr><td><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1372997\" data-size=\"medium\" data-ratio=\"0.47401247401247\" data-width=\"962\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 962px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:47.4%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1372997\"><img alt=\"Nuevo Paraiso\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg 962w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg 480w\"><noscript><img alt=\"Nuevo Paraiso\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg 962w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372997-northern_mexico.jpg 480w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\"></noscript></a><figcaption>Nuevo Paraiso</figcaption></figure><b>Nuevo Paraiso</b><br />Nuevo Paraiso (Northern Mexico) has three sub-regions: Punta Orgullo, Perdido and Diez Coronas. Some of the major features in this region are Las Hermanas, Torquemada, and Primero Quebrada. The name of 'Nuevo Paraiso' roughly means 'New Paradise' - ironic, considering the region is embroiled in bloody conflict at just about every turn.</td></tr><tr><td><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1372992-the_north.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1372992\" data-size=\"medium\" data-ratio=\"0.56683168316832\" data-width=\"808\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 808px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:56.7%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1372992-the_north.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1372992\"><img alt=\"West Elizabeth\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372992-the_north.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1372992-the_north.jpg 808w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372992-the_north.jpg 480w\"><noscript><img alt=\"West Elizabeth\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372992-the_north.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1372992-the_north.jpg 808w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1372992-the_north.jpg 480w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\"></noscript></a><figcaption>West Elizabeth</figcaption></figure><b>West Elizabeth</b><br />The third region unlocked by players. West Elizabeth boasts only one town of note: Blackwater. However, this town is much more advanced than any of the others in the west of America at this time, and boasts paved streets, a uniformed policing force, and also motor cars.</td></tr></tbody></table><h2>Multiplayer</h2><p>As is common in most recent games, Read Dead Redemption's multiplayer includes a persistent leveling system. Gaining levels earn players new horses and outfits. Weapons also level up individually; and, if a player achieves all levels on a particular weapon they will receive a gold version of the weapon. Multiplayer in Red Dead Redemption will take place in to separate forms:</p><table><tbody><tr><td><h3>Free-Roam</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1352778\" data-size=\"medium\" data-ratio=\"0.5625\" data-width=\"1280\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 1280px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:56.3%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1352778\"><img alt=\"Free Roaming Posse\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg 1280w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg 480w\"><noscript><img alt=\"Free Roaming Posse\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg 1280w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_super/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg 960w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/3/30036/1352778-19.jpg 480w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\"></noscript></a><figcaption>Free Roaming Posse</figcaption></figure> Multiplayer Free-Roam was revealed on April 9th with the release of the first official multiplayer trailer. In this mode, up to 8 players can form a 'posse' and play simultaneously, exploring the entire world map and battling each other or NPCs in a variety of modes. In their posses, players can attack gang members and their hideouts, go hunting in designated area or explore the massive terrain. In addition, there is a Hunter/Hunted mode, a game of cat and mouse where the player(s) can capture fugitives dead or alive or run from law enforcement. More game modes are said to be revealed at a later date.</td></tr><tr><td><h3>Competitive Modes</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1354779-standoff.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1354779\" data-size=\"medium\" data-ratio=\"0.56025039123631\" data-width=\"639\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 639px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:56.0%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1354779-standoff.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1354779\"><img alt=\"Competitive games begin with a Mexican Stand-Off\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1354779-standoff.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1354779-standoff.jpg 639w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1354779-standoff.jpg 480w\"><noscript><img alt=\"Competitive games begin with a Mexican Stand-Off\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1354779-standoff.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1354779-standoff.jpg 639w, https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/scale_medium/7/70212/1354779-standoff.jpg 480w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 480px) 100vw, 480px\" data-width=\"480\"></noscript></a><figcaption>Competitive games begin with a Mexican Stand-Off</figcaption></figure> The game also features a number of more conventional competitive multiplayer modes, with smaller maps and more structured rules and objectives. These game modes can be entered through specific locations in the free-roam world or through a game modes playlist. All matches begin with a \"Mexican Stand-Off\", in which all players stand in a circle and shoot off until there is only one person remaining; they will then have the advantage of running to the best vantage point before the other players respawn.<br />Five competitive modes shipped with the game:<br /><ul><li><b>Shootout</b> - Essentially a traditional deathmatch; players must kill every other player to earn points.</li><li><b>Gang Shootout</b> - This mode is a team deathmatch that brings the player's posse into the game.</li><li><b>Hold Your Own</b> - A classic game of capture the flag; each team has one base and one bag of gold and must attempt to capture each others gold and return it to their own base.</li><li><b>Gold Rush</b> - A every-man-for-himself mode with several bags of gold. Each player must find and return bags of gold to their base.</li><li><b>Grab The Bag</b> - One bag and two teams. Teams must fight to return one bag to their own base.</li></ul> Competitive modes will feature, gatling guns, cannons, horses, and crates which will supply weapons, upgrades, ammo and will fill the player's Dead-Eye meter.</td></tr></tbody></table><h2>Weapons</h2><p>Red Dead Redemption take place in a historical period in which new technologies had a huge impact on society. Specifically for the Old West, new weapon technology changed life forever, and this mix of terrifying new weapons and old classics are the tools for John Marston.</p><table><tbody><tr><td><h3>Lasso</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366620-lasso.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366620\" data-size=\"small\" data-ratio=\"0.64028776978417\" data-width=\"278\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 278px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:64.0%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366620-lasso.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366620\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 278px) 100vw, 278px\" data-width=\"278\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366620-lasso.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366620-lasso.jpg 278w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366620-lasso.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366620-lasso.jpg 278w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 278px) 100vw, 278px\" data-width=\"278\"></noscript></a></figure> A staple of life in the old west; the lasso can be used to take down both animals and people. It makes it much easier to return bandits alive and earn greater rewards, and it also allows players to capture and train wild horses or take down other wildlife. This weapon is perfect for hog tying people to train tracks and gleefully watching them get crushed.</td></tr><tr><td><h3>Cattleman Revolver</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366619-revolver.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366619\" data-size=\"small\" data-ratio=\"0.66898954703833\" data-width=\"287\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 287px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:66.9%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366619-revolver.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366619\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 287px) 100vw, 287px\" data-width=\"287\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366619-revolver.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366619-revolver.jpg 287w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366619-revolver.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366619-revolver.jpg 287w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 287px) 100vw, 287px\" data-width=\"287\"></noscript></a></figure> The Cattleman Revolver is a basic 'six-shooter', appearing in the game as a starter pistol. It provides an acceptable, if not extremely impressive first rung on the firearm ladder, and is a staple weapon of many players during the early game.</td></tr><tr><td><h3><b>Mauser Pistol</b></h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366621-pistol.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366621\" data-size=\"small\" data-ratio=\"0.5956678700361\" data-width=\"277\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 277px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:59.6%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366621-pistol.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366621\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 277px) 100vw, 277px\" data-width=\"277\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366621-pistol.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366621-pistol.jpg 277w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366621-pistol.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366621-pistol.jpg 277w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 277px) 100vw, 277px\" data-width=\"277\"></noscript></a></figure> The 'Mauser Pistol' is a German-made semi-automatic pistol. According to media produced about the game, the pistol has high power. While this is the case, the High Powered Pistol proves to be more damaging to hostiles. The Mauser has the highest rate of fire of any of the pistols and can be rapid fired should a player use Dead Eye, or have a sufficiently fast trigger finger.</td></tr><tr><td><h3>Repeater Carbine</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366668-repeater.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366668\" data-size=\"small\" data-ratio=\"0.46153846153846\" data-width=\"286\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 286px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:46.2%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366668-repeater.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366668\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 286px) 100vw, 286px\" data-width=\"286\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366668-repeater.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366668-repeater.jpg 286w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366668-repeater.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366668-repeater.jpg 286w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 286px) 100vw, 286px\" data-width=\"286\"></noscript></a></figure> This gun represents one of the older weapons in the game, but still proves to be one of it's most useful. The Repeater Carbine balances range and power, and is easy to use while on horseback; a trait that makes it ideal for the Old West.</td></tr><tr><td><h3>Throwing Knives</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366669-knife.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366669\" data-size=\"small\" data-ratio=\"0.46043165467626\" data-width=\"278\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 278px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:46.0%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366669-knife.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366669\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 278px) 100vw, 278px\" data-width=\"278\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366669-knife.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366669-knife.jpg 278w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366669-knife.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366669-knife.jpg 278w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 278px) 100vw, 278px\" data-width=\"278\"></noscript></a></figure> The throwing knives of Red Dead Redemption are perfectly balanced for throwing. They are perfect for quick, effective, and most importantly quiet take downs.</td></tr><tr><td><h3>Sawed-Off Shotgun</h3><figure data-align=\"right\" data-img-src=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366670-shotgun.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366670\" data-size=\"small\" data-ratio=\"0.45614035087719\" data-width=\"285\" data-embed-type=\"image\" style=\"width: 285px\"><a class=\"fluid-height\" style=\"padding-bottom:45.6%\" href=\"https://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/original/7/70212/1366670-shotgun.jpg\" data-ref-id=\"1300-1366670\"><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==\" sizes=\"(max-width: 285px) 100vw, 285px\" data-width=\"285\" class=\"js-lazy-load-image\" data-src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366670-shotgun.jpg\" data-srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366670-shotgun.jpg 285w\"><noscript><img alt=\"No Caption Provided\" src=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366670-shotgun.jpg\" srcset=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/a/uploads/original/7/70212/1366670-shotgun.jpg 285w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 285px) 100vw, 285px\" data-width=\"285\"></noscript></a></figure> This powerful weapon's shorter barrel means it has a wider spread over a shorter distance. If players double taps the trigger while wielding the sawed-off they can fire from both barrels for devastating effect.</td></tr></tbody></table><p>Other guns that appear in the game are sniper rifles, automatic pistols and buffalo rifles, and other weapons such as; <a href=\"../../molotov-cocktail/93-75/\" rel=\"nofollow \"> fire bottles</a>, cannons, <a href=\"../../gatling-gun/93-288/\" rel=\"nofollow \"> Gatling guns</a> and dynamite can also be unlocked.</p><h2>Avatar Awards</h2><p>Red Dead Redemption has several <a href=\"../../avatar-awards/92-3749/\" rel=\"nofollow \"> avatar awards</a>.</p><ul><li><b>Posse T-Shirt</b>: Awarded to the community for reaching a certain total of XP in the Multiplayer Mode.</li><li><b>Gentleman's Attire</b>: Awarded to the community for reaching a certain total of XP in the Multiplayer Mode.</li><li><b>Lady's Finery</b>: Complete the Rockstar Game Social Club \"Skin It To Win It\" challenge</li><li><a href=\"http://media.giantbomb.com/uploads/0/7938/1399440-yellowrockstarlogotshirt.png\" rel=\"nofollow \"> Yellow Rockstar Logo T-Shirt</a> - Open the chest in the attic of the farm house in Beecher's Hope.</li><li><a href=\"http://media.giantbomb.com/uploads/0/7628/1379319-avatar_body.png\" rel=\"nofollow \"> Black on Red RDR Logo T-Shirt</a> - Open the chest inside the burned down cabin at Riley's Charge.</li><li><a href=\"http://media.giantbomb.com/uploads/0/7628/1379281-1.png\" rel=\"nofollow \"> Sombrero</a> - Shoot someone's hat off (without killing them).</li></ul><h2>Plot</h2><p>The game is set in 1911, in the American Old West. On the trailing edge of the Industrial Revolution, westward expansion is starting to tame New Austin's once wild plains. The government is also starting to invade the west, much to the local population's dismay. Players step in the shoes of <a href=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/john-marston/3005-9449/\">John Marston</a>, a former <a href=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/bandit/3015-3588/\">outlaw</a> who has been forced to work as a gunfighter for the government.</p><p>The game starts at a train station in <a href=\"https://www.giantbomb.com/blackwater/3035-3029/\">Blackwater</a> as two federal agents escort Marston to a train headed west to Armadillo.
